high_descs: Turn to the right and had to the big brown chair in the corner.
Pick up the book on the chair.
Turn around and bring the book to the grey couch.
Put the book on the middle of the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put a book on the couch.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the chair that has a book on it.
Pick up the book from the chair.
Turn around and walk to the sofa.
Put the book on the sofa, to the right of the keys.
tasks.task_desc: Move a book from a chair to a sofa.

high_descs: Turn right, go straight to the brown chair.
Take the book from the chair's cushion.
Turn around, go straight to the couch, then turn right, move to where the middle and right couch cushions meet, face the couch.
Put the book on the right side of the middle couch cushion.
tasks.task_desc: Put a book on a couch cushion.

high_descs: Turn to your left and walk to the coffee table to your right.
Pick up the gold, dog statue on the magazine, on top of the coffee table.
Walk around to the other side of the coffee table, directly across from you.
Place the gold dog statue on the left corner of the table, closest to you.
tasks.task_desc: Move the dog statue to the other side of the table.

high_descs: Turn left, walk over to the coffee table, then turn left to face it
Pick up the golden figurine that is sitting on the table.
Walk around to the other side of the coffee table.
Place the golden figurine down on the left side of the coffee table.
tasks.task_desc: Move a figurine from one side of the coffee table to the other.

high_descs: Turn and go to the coffee table.
Pick up the cell phone on the coffee table.
Turn to the left and go to the cloth chair.
Put the cell phone on the cloth chair.
Turn and go to the TV cabinet.
Pick up the cell phone from the TV cabinet.
Turn and go to the cloth chair.
Put the cell phone on the cloth chair.
tasks.task_desc: Move the cells phones to the cloth chair.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the front of the couch.
Pick up the cell phone that's to the right of the keys.
Turn left and walk to the brown chair with the credit card.
Put the cell phone on the chair in front of the credit card.
Turn left and walk to the coffee table.
Pick up the cell phone next to the tissue box.
Turn around and walk back to the brown chair.
Put the cell phone down to the left of the other cell phone.
tasks.task_desc: To gather cell phones in the room.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the couch move so you are facing the center right of the couch.
Pick up the remote that is on the couch.
With the remote in hand go to the brown chair that is to the right of the wooden brown chair.
Place the remote on top right of the item that is on the chair.
Turn and go to the coffee table on the opposite side of the couch.
Pick up the cell phone that is on the coffee table.
Go to the brown chair that is to the right of the wooden brown chair with the phone in hand.
Place the cell phone on top of the object that is on the chair on the left side of it.
tasks.task_desc: Put items on chair.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the table by the window.
Pick up the cell phone on the table.
Turn around and go to the cloth chair.
Put the cell phone on the cloth chair.
Turn around and go to the sofa.
Pick up the cell phone on the sofa.
Turn around and go to the cloth chair.
Put the cell phone on the cloth chair.
tasks.task_desc: Move the cell phones to the cloth chair.

high_descs: Turn right, go toward the TV, then turn left and go to the wall, then turn right to face the white table.
Pick up the keys from the table.
Turn right and go forward, then turn right to go to the coffee table.
Put the keys in the box on the coffee table.
Pick up the box on the coffee table.
Turn right and go to the sofa.
Place the box on the sofa.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box with keys in it on the sofa.

high_descs: Turn right walk forward and head to the side table on the wall
Pick up the keys on the side table
Turn right then turn right facing the left side of the center table
Put the keys in the box
Pick up the box with keys
Turn right then head to the sofa
Put the box with keys on the left side of the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put the box with keys on the sofa

high_descs: Turn right and walk until you're about a foot from the tv stand then turn left and walk to the wall to the right of the couch then turn right to face the small white table.
Pick up the keys  that are in front of you.
Turn right and walk to the tv then turn right and walk to the coffee table.
Put the keys in the box on the coffee table.
Pick up the box with the keys in it.
Turn right and walk to the couch then take a step to your left.
Put the couch where the left pillow and middle pillow meet at the height of the phone on the right.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box with keys in it on the couch.

high_descs: Turn to the left and take one step, then turn right and walk to the brown chair.
Pick up the keys on the brown chair.
Turn to the left and take three steps, then turn to the left and face the table.
Put the keys in the box on the coffee table.
Pick up the box with the keys in it.
Turn right and take one step, then turn left and take one step, then turn right to face the couch.
Put the box on the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Move the box and keys to the couch.

high_descs: Turn left make steps then turn right walk towards the couch
Pick up the keys on the sofa
Turn left then make turns till you reach the right side end of the center table
Put the keys in the box
Pick up the box with keys on the table
Turn right walk forward the face the sofa
Put the box with keys on the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put the box with keys on the sofa

high_descs: Go to the couch
Pick up the keys
Go to the table
Put the keys in the box
Pick up the box
Go to the sofa
Put the box on the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put a box with keys in it on the sofa

high_descs: walk straight towards the couch and turn right right then a quick left and walk to the wall and then turn right towards the white table
pick up the pencil off of the white table
turn right and walk straight towards the wooden chair and then turn right and walk straight then make quick left then another right and walk straight and make another right towards the table
put the pencil down in front of the tissue box
look up and walk straight a bit then turn left and walk straight towards the chair and turn right then walk straight towards the couch and turn left and walk straight to the wooden table
pick up the pencil behind the tissue box
turn left then walk straight then turn left in front of the chair and then walk straight and turn right in between the two chairs then turn left then left again and walk straight to the table
put the pencil down on top of the table
tasks.task_desc: clean up pencils and put them on the table

high_descs: Turn right move forward then turn right, head to the side table on your left
Pick up the cell phone beside the plant on the side table
Turn right and head to the center table
Put the cell phone in the box
Pick up the box with cell phone
Turn right walk forward then turn left face the sofa
Put the box with cell phone on the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put the box with cell phone on the sofa

high_descs: Walk over to the small round white table in the corner of the room.
Pick up the phone off of the white table.
Turn right and forward, the hang a right and walk up to the coffee table.
Put the phone in the cardboard box that is on the coffee table.
Pick up the cardboard box with the phone in it.
Walk to the couch against the wall on your right.
Put the cardboard box with the phone in it on the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cardboard box with a phone in it on the couch.

high_descs: walk to face the small white table to the right of the sofa
pick up the cell phone from the table top
turn to face the rectangular coffee table with the box on top
put the phone into the box on the coffee table
pick up the box from the coffee table
turn right to face the sofa
place the box on the sofa
tasks.task_desc: put a phone in a box on a sofa

high_descs: Turn left then head to the side table on the wall
Pick up the cell phone on the side table
Turn right and head to the center table
Put the cell phone in the box
Pick up the box with cell phone
Turn right and head in front of the sofa
Put the box with cell phone on the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put the box with cell phone on the sofa

high_descs: Walk over to the small round white table in the corner of the room.
Pick up the phone off of the small white table.
Turn right and walk forward, then hang a right and walk up to the coffee table.
Put the phone in the cardboard box on the coffee table.
Pick up the cardboard box with the phone in it.
Walk over to the couch on your right.
Put the cardboard box with the phone on it onto the middle cushion of the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cardboard box with a phone in it on the couch.

high_descs: Turn left, walk across the room to the end of the sofa, turn left, walk to the wall, and face the table.
Pick up the smartphone.
Turn right, and walk to the coffee table.
Put the smartphone in the box.
Pick up the box.
Walk around the coffee table to the sofa.
Put the box on the sofa.
tasks.task_desc: Put a smartphone in a box and put the box on the sofa.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the coffee table.
Pick up the keys between the two boxes of tissue on the table.
Turn to your right, go to the end of the table, make a left at the end of the table and go to the couch across from the table.
Place the keys on the front, left corner of the right end of the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys on the couch.

high_descs: Turn around and walk over to the coffee table facing toward the sofa
Pick up the keys from the table
Walk around the right side of the coffee table and up to the sofa
Put the keys down on the right side of the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys on the sofa

high_descs: turn around and go to the wooden coffee table in the middle of the living room
pick up the keys from the table
go around the table carry the keys with you; face the grey couch
place the keys on the left side of the couch on the cushion towards the center
tasks.task_desc: Put car keys on the couch

high_descs: Turn right and go to the wooden coffee table to the side opposite of the sofa.
Pick up the gray phone near the front edge of the table.
Turn right and go to the front of the white TV stand.
Place the phone on the top of the TV stand towards the front edge in front of the magazine.
Turn around and go back to the coffee table between the sofa and the table.
Pick up the gray phone on the left of the magazine.
Turn left to go back to the white TV stand.
Place the phone on the left side of the first phone.
tasks.task_desc: Move the phones on the table to the TV stand.

high_descs: Move to face the coffee table so that the statue is at the top left corner when you look at it.
Pick up the phone that's in front of the remote control.
Bring the phone with you over to the console table with the television on it.
Put the phone down on the console table so that it's in front of the magazine.
Go back to the coffee table and face it so that now the empty box is at the top left corner when you look at it.
Pick up the phone that's between the magazine and the box of tissues.
Bring the phone with you and go back over to the console table.
Put the second phone down to the left of the first one.
tasks.task_desc: Move the phones to the console table.

high_descs: Go to the right, walk between the couch and the table and turn left to face the table.
Pick a phone that is between the tissue paper box on the table.
Go to the left, turn right after the table, walk 1 step and turn left to go to the white TV cabinet.
Put the phone on top of the white cabinet.
Turn around, walk straight, turn right at the end of the table and turn right to face the other side of the table.
Pick up the phone from on top of the table.
Go back to the white TV cabinet.
Put the phone next to the other phone on the cabinet.
tasks.task_desc: Put 2 phone side by side on the white TV cabinet.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the white table with the plant on it on the left.
Pick up the pen to the right of the plant.
Turn around and walk to the television on the left.
Put the pen down on the television stand to the left of the remote.
Walk to the couch, turn left, walk straight ahead to the wooden tables.
Pick up the pen from the left wooden table.
Turn around and walk to the television stand.
Put the pen down on the television stand and on top of the remote on the right.
tasks.task_desc: To move to pens to the television stand.

high_descs: Turn to the left, walk to the small table that is on the left of the tv
Pick up the pen that is on the table
Turn around, walk the pen to the tv stand
Place the pen on the tv stand
Turn to the left, take a few steps, then walk to the desk in front of the window
Pick up the pen that is on the desk
Turn around, walk the pen to the tv stand
Place the pen on the tv stand
tasks.task_desc: Pick up pens from the room, place on tv stand

high_descs: Turn right, proceed until reach chair on your right.  Turn right, proceed until coffee table in on your right.  Turn right to face table.
Pick up tissue box off of coffee table, to the right of the credit card.
Turn left, go to end of table, turn right, go to end of table.  Turn left, go to end table across room with pen on it.
Place tissues diagonal on table to the left of the pen.
tasks.task_desc: Move to table, pick up tissue box and place on table with pen on it.

high_descs: Turn right and walk forward then turn right again and walk over to the coffee table, facing toward the sofa
Pick up the tissue box from the coffee table
Turn left and walk around the coffee table over to the small table left of the computer desk
Put the tissue box on the left side of the small table
tasks.task_desc: Put the tissue box on the small table

high_descs: Go right and then turn right and go forward and turn right towards the table with the box on it.
Pick the box of tissues up from the table.
Go around the table and left to face the table with a pen and a statue on it.
Put the tissues down to the left of the pen.
tasks.task_desc: Put tissues down on a table.

high_descs: turn left, walk toward the couch, turn left, turn left to face the coffee table
pick up the tissue box that is on the coffee table
turn right, walk forward to the table
put the tissue box on the table
tasks.task_desc: move tissue box from coffee table to a small table

high_descs: Turn left and walk around to the other side of the coffee table, across from the couch.
Pick up the closest tissue box.
Turn right and walk ahead to the small wooden table, to the left of the desk.
Place the tissue box on the table in the front left corner.
tasks.task_desc: Place a tissue box on a table.

high_descs: Turn right then turn right again and walk to the dresser with the TV on top.
Take the book that was under the TV.
Turn back around and walk to the brown chair with the remote on it.
Place the book next to the remote
tasks.task_desc: Place the book beside the remote on the chair.

high_descs: Turn around, turn right, then turn right to go around the chair, then go to the entertainment center at the TV.
Pick up the book from under the TV.
Turn right, the turn right again, walk past the coffee table, then go to the brown chair.
Place the book on the chair, to the left of the remote.
tasks.task_desc: Put a book on the chair.

high_descs: Turn to the left and look around. Walk towards the boots and make a right. Walk towards the table and turn and face right. Walk towards the end of the table and turn left and go towards the TV.
Pick up the DVD case that is by the TV.
Turn around and go back towards the table and walk past it towards the edge turning to the right then back walking straight near the chair. Turn left towards the chair.
Place the DVD on the chair next to the remote.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up the DVD case to place it on the chair.

high_descs: Turn right, go to the coffee table, turn right to face the coffee table.
Pick up the book closest to the edge of the table.
Turn left, go to the brown chair on the right with the remote control on it.
Put the book on the left of the remote control on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a book on a chair.

high_descs: turn right and walk over to the coffee table
pick up the closest book to you on the coffee table
turn around and face the darker brown chair behind you
place the book on top of the darker brown chair
tasks.task_desc: place a book from the coffee table on top of the dark brown chair

high_descs: Walk straight and turn around to face the room. Walk past the first chair and turn right to face the table.
Pick up the book that is near the tissue box.
Go left to the end of the table and turn right. Turn left again and go around the chair with the remote.
Place the book on the chair next to the remote.
tasks.task_desc: Removing the book from the table to place it on the chair.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the book on the desk.
Pick up the book from the desk.
Turn around and walk to the sofa on the left.
Put the book on the middle of the sofa, to the right of the keys.
tasks.task_desc: Move a book from a desk to a sofa.

high_descs: turn to the left walk forward turn to the left
pick up the book on the table
turn to the right turn to the right walk forward until you reach the end of the couch turn to the left
put the book on the couch
tasks.task_desc: move the book to the couch

high_descs: Turn left, walk to the table by the window
Grab the book on the table
Turn around, walk to the grey sofa on the left
Put the book down on the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Move the book from the table to the sofa
